product_name: Kiss My Face Natural Mineral Spray SPF 30 - 8 fl. oz.
long_description: With a chemical-free formula that's easy on sensitive skin, the Kiss My Face Natural Mineral Spray SPF 30 sunscreen provides broad-spectrum protection from harmful ultraviolet rays. All-natural mineral formula provides broad-spectrum UVA and UVB SPF 30. Contains no nanoparticles, artificial colors or fragrances. Aloe vera extract soothes skin. Spray bottle makes application easy and is non-greasy on skin.
short_description: With a chemical-free formula that's easy on sensitive skin, the Kiss My Face Natural Mineral Spray SPF 30 sunscreen provides broad-spectrum protection from harmful ultraviolet rays.
